mapper.select: select id, section, book, "group", volume, article, contents, paragraph1, paragraph2, paragraph3, paragraph4, paragraph5, paragraph6, paragraph7, paragraph8, paragraph9, paragraph10 from internal_exams_stt where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into internal_exams_stt ( created, modified, section, book, volume, "group", article, contents, paragraph1, paragraph2, paragraph3, paragraph4, paragraph5, paragraph6, paragraph7, paragraph8, paragraph9, paragraph10 ) values ( now(), now(), #{section}, #{book}, #{volume}, #{group}, #{article}, #{contents}, #{paragraph1}, #{paragraph2}, #{paragraph3}, #{paragraph4}, #{paragraph5}, #{paragraph6}, #{paragraph7}, #{paragraph8}, #{paragraph9}, #{paragraph10} )
mapper.update: update internal_exams_stt set modified = now(), contents = #{contents}, paragraph1 = #{paragraph1}, paragraph2 = #{paragraph2}, paragraph3 = #{paragraph3}, paragraph4 = #{paragraph4}, paragraph5 = #{paragraph5}, paragraph6 = #{paragraph6}, paragraph7 = #{paragraph7}, paragraph8 = #{paragraph8}, paragraph9 = #{paragraph9}, paragraph10 = #{paragraph10} where id = #{id}
